LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: 被恋尸癖吓坏了
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Horrible.stages.0.label: 被恋尸癖困扰
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Horrible.stages.0.descrip: 呃，太恶心了！他们到底在想什么？
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Disapproved.stages.0.desc: 即使是死人也不能在这里休息......

LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Acceptable.stages.0.descr: 他们最好在完成后埋掉剩下的东西......
LanguageData.SawNecrophilia_Approved.stages.0.label: 批准恋尸癖
